1000001000101011 0011110110111111 0 -> sum: 1011111111101010, cout: 0

1001101100001100 1001101101001101 1 -> sum: 0011011001011010, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
